name: DevOps specialist - FX4Cash
description:
FX4Cash is a market leader cross currency payment platform. It's a joint venture between Cash Management and global FX trading businesses offering solution for cross border payments targeted to Financial Institutions, Non-bank and Corporate Clients. The product integrates with variety of Deutsche Bank’s client access channels, global payment and clearing systems, and FX trading infrastructure. It supports diverse requirements of the global clients base for payables, receivables and passive cross-border flows across multitude of currencies, payment options, rates and value dates.

FX4Cash IT team is responsible for

  • Delivering business and regulatory changes in FX4Cash as well as improving its stability
  • Re-engineer 10-year old FX4Cash application to improve its stability and support faster time to market

Development team is 30 people and will grow for 10 people this year to deliver growing business demand

You will gain experience of working the IT team supporting important global business, establishing SRE culture and function in the team, develop and establish reliable monitoring tools and support procedures for business critical application

Responsibilities

  • Manage support for business critical application - be key contact for issue resolution, work directly with Application Team Engineers to ensure that production issues are resolved as expediently as possible
  • Work in close collaboration with Development team on application monitoring improvements, deployment scripts, application run books and support procedures
  • Knows and leverage all support automation and troubleshooting, and drive development of proactive resolution tools, serving application stability
  • Manages Release rollouts stability and control detailed pre-launch dry runs, and post-Release production lifecycle

Skills

  • 2+ years of equivalent work experience of applying technical solutions to improve the stability of production environments
  • Experience managing a team
  • Experience in Enterprise software companies
  • Working experience of some of the following technology skills:
  • Operating systems (e.g. UNIX, Windows) and the underlying infrastructure environments
  • Middleware messaging (IBM MQ, JMS, Kafka), Web application servers and proxies (Tomcat, Apache, NGinx, HaProxy )
  • Database environments (Oracle)
  • Automation, monitoring and data analytics tools (e.g. Monitoring tool (Geneos), Ansible/Tower, Splunk, Prometheus/Grafana)
  • Scripting languages (e.g. UNIX shell and powershell, PERL, Python, JAVA/.NET)
  • Good understanding of ITIL Service Management framework such as Incident, Problem, and Change processes.
  • Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with attention to detail.
  • Fluent English

Technology stack

  • Messaging: Kafka, IBM MQ
  • Java 8, 11: Multithreading, Collections, JMM
  • Git, Maven, Jenkins
  • Plan migrate to Google Cloud in 2022

What we offer

  • Flexible working hours
  • Partially remote work
  • Comfortable office located in the city center
  • Extended insurance package: medical and life insurance + partial coverage for spouse and children
  • Plenty of professional learning opportunities: English courses, professional trainings and certification, conferences participation
  • Relocation package (for new-joiners from other locations)
